metadata.title: CVE-2017-12111 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable out-of-bounds vulnerability exists in the xls_addCellfunction of libxls 1.4. A specially crafted XLS file with a formula recordcan cause memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attackercan send a malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
